data.eml:eml: Pethia longicauda, a new species of barb (Teleostei: Cyprinidae) from the northern Western Ghats, India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Katwate, Unmesh, Paingankar, Mandar S., Raghavan, Rajeev, Dahanukar, Neelesh (2014): Pethia longicauda, a new species of barb (Teleostei: Cyprinidae) from the northern Western Ghats, India. Zootaxa 3846 (2): 235-248, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3846.2.4
